verses.text: \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, an \w apostle|strong="G0652"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* the \w commandment|strong="G2003"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Saviour|strong="G4990"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \add which is\add* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w*;

Unto \w Timothy|strong="G5095"\w*, \add my\add* \w own|strong="G1103"\w* \w son|strong="G5043"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*: \w Grace|strong="G5485"\w*, \w mercy|strong="G1656"\w*, \add and\add* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*, \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w As|strong="G2531"\w* I \w besought|strong="G3870"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w* to abide \w still|strong="G4357"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Ephesus|strong="G2181"\w*, when I \w went|strong="G4198"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Macedonia|strong="G3109"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* thou mightest \w charge|strong="G3853"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* that they \w teach|strong="G2085"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* other \w doctrine|strong="G2085"\w*,

\w Neither|strong="G3366"\w* give heed \w to|strong="G4337"\w* \w fables|strong="G3454"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w endless|strong="G0562"\w* \w genealogies|strong="G1076"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w minister|strong="G3930"\w* \w questions|strong="G2214"\w*, \w rather|strong="G3123"\w* \w than|strong="G2228"\w* \w godly|strong="G2316"\w* \w edifying|strong="G3620"\w* which \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*: \add so do\add*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* the \w end|strong="G5056"\w* of the \w commandment|strong="G3852"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w charity|strong="G0026"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* a \w pure|strong="G2513"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add of\add* a \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w conscience|strong="G4893"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add of\add* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w unfeigned|strong="G0505"\w*:
From \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* having \w swerved|strong="G0795"\w* have turned \w aside|strong="G1624"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* vain \w jangling|strong="G3150"\w*;

\w Desiring|strong="G2309"\w* to \w be|strong="G1511"\w* teachers of the \w law|strong="G3547"\w*; \w understanding|strong="G3539"\w* \w neither|strong="G3383"\w* \w what|strong="G3739"\w* they \w say|strong="G3004"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3383"\w* \w whereof|strong="G4012"\w* they \w affirm|strong="G1226"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* we \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \add is\add* \w good|strong="G2570"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* a \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w use|strong="G5530"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w lawfully|strong="G3545"\w*;

\w Knowing|strong="G1492"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w is|strong="G2749"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* made \w for|strong="G2749"\w* a righteous \w man|strong="G1342"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* for the \w lawless|strong="G0459"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w disobedient|strong="G0506"\w*, for the \w ungodly|strong="G0765"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* for \w sinners|strong="G0268"\w*, for \w unholy|strong="G0462"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w profane|strong="G0952"\w*, for murderers of \w fathers|strong="G3964"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* murderers of \w mothers|strong="G3389"\w*, for \w manslayers|strong="G0409"\w*,

For \w whoremongers|strong="G4205"\w*, for them that defile themselves with \w mankind|strong="G0733"\w*, for \w menstealers|strong="G0405"\w*, for \w liars|strong="G5583"\w*, for perjured \w persons|strong="G1965"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* there \w be|strong="G0480"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* other \w thing|strong="G2087"\w* that is contrary \w to|strong="G0480"\w* \w sound|strong="G5198"\w* \w doctrine|strong="G1319"\w*;

According \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w glorious|strong="G1391"\w* \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* of the \w blessed|strong="G3107"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* was committed \w to|strong="G4100"\w* \w my|strong="G1473"\w* \w trust|strong="G4100"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G2192"\w* \w thank|strong="G5485"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, who hath \w enabled|strong="G1743"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w*, for \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he \w counted|strong="G2233"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w*, putting \w me|strong="G5087"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w ministry|strong="G1248"\w*;

Who \w was|strong="G5607"\w* \w before|strong="G4386"\w* a \w blasphemer|strong="G0989"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* a \w persecutor|strong="G1376"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w injurious|strong="G5197"\w*: \w but|strong="G0235"\w* I obtained \w mercy|strong="G1653"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* I \w did|strong="G4160"\w* \add it\add* \w ignorantly|strong="G0050"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w unbelief|strong="G0570"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* was exceeding \w abundant|strong="G5250"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w* which \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w This|strong="G3588"\w* \add is\add* a \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w saying|strong="G3056"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w worthy|strong="G0514"\w* of \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w acceptation|strong="G0594"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w* to \w save|strong="G4982"\w* \w sinners|strong="G0268"\w*; of \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w chief|strong="G4413"\w*.

\w Howbeit|strong="G0235"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* this \w cause|strong="G5124"\w* I obtained \w mercy|strong="G1653"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w me|strong="G1698"\w* \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* might shew \w forth|strong="G1731"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w longsuffering|strong="G3115"\w*, \w for|strong="G4314"\w* a \w pattern|strong="G5296"\w* to them which should \w hereafter|strong="G3195"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w* \w everlasting|strong="G0166"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* unto the \w King|strong="G0935"\w* \w eternal|strong="G0165"\w*, \w immortal|strong="G0862"\w*, \w invisible|strong="G0517"\w*, the \w only|strong="G3441"\w* \w wise|strong="G4680"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \add be\add* \w honour|strong="G5092"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w* and \w ever|strong="G0165"\w*. \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*.

\w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w charge|strong="G3852"\w* I \w commit|strong="G3908"\w* unto \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*, \w son|strong="G5043"\w* \w Timothy|strong="G5095"\w*, according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w prophecies|strong="G4394"\w* which went \w before|strong="G4254"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w thou|strong="G4754"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* mightest \w war|strong="G4754"\w* a \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w warfare|strong="G4752"\w*;

\w Holding|strong="G2192"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* a \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w conscience|strong="G4893"\w*; \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* having put \w away|strong="G0683"\w* \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* have made \w shipwreck|strong="G3489"\w*:

Of \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w Hymenaeus|strong="G5211"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Alexander|strong="G0223"\w*; \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* I have \w delivered|strong="G3860"\w* unto \w Satan|strong="G4567"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they may \w learn|strong="G3811"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* to \w blaspheme|strong="G0987"\w*.
